hadiths.text: ‘Abd Allaah bin ‘Umar said “The Apostle of Allaah(ﷺ) prohibited to travel with a copy of the Qur’an to the enemy territory. The narrator Malik said “(It is) I think lest the enemy should take it

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْمُصْحَفِ يُسَافَرُ بِهِ إِلَى أَرْضِ الْعَدُوِّ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Traveling To The Territory Of The Enemy With The Mushaf
